snippet: Supporters of universal health care have gathered enough signatures to put their plan on Colorado ballots next year.
abstract: Supporters of universal healthcare in Colorado collect enough signatures to put plan on state's 2016 ballot that would make state first to opt out of Affordable Care Act.
lead_paragraph: Supporters of universal health care have gathered enough signatures to put their plan on Colorado ballots next year.

headline.main: Colorado: Referendum on Universal Health Care Is Set
headline.print_headline: Colorado: Referendum on Universal Health Care Is Set

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act (2010)
